death_skill_description: How apt you are at avoiding loss from death.
selection_description: Choose your playstyle. Will you risk everything for increased rewards?
food_loss: Consumed food will be lost on death.
food_loss_deathlink: Consumed food loss can be reduced by Deathlink progression.
non_skill_items_destroy: Non-skill checked items will be destroyed.
non_skill_items_character: Non-skill checked items will stay on your character.
non_skill_items_tombstone: Non-skill checked items will be saved to your tombstone.
saved_to_tombstone: Saved items will be saved to your tombstone.
saved_to_character: Saved items will stay on your character.
no_item_loss: Items will not be lost on death.
all_item_loss: All items will be destroyed on death.
limited_saved_deathlink: A limited number of items will be saved, based on Deathlink progression.
